definitions.definition: An edible plant, Lactuca sativa and its close relatives, having a head of green and/or purple leaves.
The leaves of the lettuce plant, eaten as a vegetable; as a dish often mixed with other ingredients, dressing etc.
definitions.example: I’ll have a ham sandwich with lettuce and tomato.
Twelve dollars an hour? That's a lot of lettuce!

definitions.definition: A strong yellow-green colour, like that of lettuce (also called lettuce green).
